briefTitle: Clinical Study to Test the Efficacy and Safety of Adapalene, 0.1%
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel Group Study to Demonstrate the Efficacy and Safety of Adapalene Lotion, 0.1% Compared With Vehicle Lotion in Subjects With Acne Vulgaris
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Adapalene, 0.1% is safe and effective in the treatment of Acne Vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Co-Primary Endpoint: Success Rate on Investigator's Global Assessment (IGA) From Baseline to Week 12
